div.p: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happenedâ€¦?

Two years ago, i went in Malta with my brother in a hostfamily. They are very nice and sometimes i text them on Facebook. We did a lot of activities like visiting or swimming , we really liked it. We met a lot of people from different countries, some of them were from Germany others were from Japon or Russia.The weather is always good, very sunny and hot ! It was a unforgettable holiday
